KnowledgeItem.Title: GitCloneWorkflow
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for cloning a Git Repository by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding DataBlocks in the Issue.

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock GitCloneWorkflow and triggers the workflow for successful completion.

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetMachine=${GCW:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${GCW:User}
				Lib=PKG
				PKG=git
				Host=${GCW:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
				/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
				TargetPath='${GCW:TargetPath}'
				TargetMachine=${GCW:TargetMachine}
				TargetState=Created
				GitRepoURL='${GCW:GitRepoUrl}'
				GitRepoName=${GCW:GitRepoName}
				User=${GCW:User}
				Host=${GCW:Host}
				Lib=GITCLONE
				CurrentState=ReadState
                TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
                GitBranch=${GCW:GitBranch}
                GitOrigin=${GCW:GitOrigin}
				/></NewBlock>
